name: ¡MichiAventura! (Nyadventure!)
description:
¡Michiaventura! (Nyadventure!) is a platformer game where you control a cat on his objective to climb up a mountain.

  • Jump and overcome all the obstacles in the way!
  • Explore to uncover secret gems or shortcuts!
  • Be careful with the weather!
  • Have fun in 13 levels and 3 different zones!

*Disclaimer: I did everything except the audio of the game. Every clip & music belongs to it's respective creators.
